DOC.brief_summary: Randomized controlled trial of statin intervention in dyslipidemic obese teenagers. Primary outcome is intima media thickness before and after intervention.
DOC.brief_title: Intima Media Thickness Regression in Dyslipidemic Teenagers
DOC.detailed_description: Obese teenagers with abnormal lipid profiles were randomized to either low dose statin or placebo and had their carotid intima media thickness compared before and after intervention.
DOC.criteria: Obesity Abnormal Triglyceride levels (>1.7mmol/L). Abnormal HDLC levels (1.0mmol/L) Abnormal thyroid unfction (not treated) Diabetes
